Calculate percentage

Source: R/utils.R
calculate_percentage.Rd

Calculates percentage with proper formatting.

Usage

calculate_percentage(x, total = sum(x), digits = 1)

Arguments

x

Numeric vector of values.

total

Numeric value representing the total. Default is sum(x).

digits

Integer specifying the number of decimal places. Default is 1.

Value

Character vector of formatted percentages.

Details

The function performs the following steps:

  1. Validates input parameters

  2. Calculates percentages

  3. Formats with proper decimal places

  4. Adds percentage symbol

This function is useful for:

  • Calculating cell type percentages

  • Formatting plot labels

  • Reporting statistics

The function ensures:

  • Proper percentage calculation

  • Consistent decimal places

  • Clean output format with

See also

format_number for number formatting

Examples

calculate_percentage(c(10, 20, 30))
#> [1] "16.7%" "33.3%" "50.0%"
